select seq_board.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO board ( brd_no, brd_wrtr, brd_conts, brd_rgdt, brd_hit, ch_no, th_no, brd_ttl, GUBUN ) values ( #{brdNo}, #{brdWrtr}, #{brdConts}, sysdate, #{brdHit}, #{chNo}, 0, #{brdTtl},'N' )
mapper.select: select b.brd_no , b.brd_wrtr , b.brd_conts , b.brd_rgdt , b.brd_hit , b.brd_ttl , b.ch_no , b.th_no , m.mem_name , m.mem_prflimg from board b join member m on b.brd_wrtr = m.mem_no where b.brd_no = #{brdNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD b JOIN CHANNEL_THREAD ct ON b.TH_NO = ct.TH_NO JOIN MEMBER m ON b.BRD_WRTR = m.MEM_NO WHERE b.TH_NO = 0 AND b.GUBUN = 'N' AND b.CH_NO = #{chNo} ORDER BY b.BRD_RGDT DESC
SELECT CH_TTL FROM CHANNEL WHERE CH_NO = #{chNo}
mapper.update: update board set brd_hit = brd_hit + 1 where brd_no = #{brdNo}
